content: Has there been any further discussion/progress on launching the "full EOF" Shandong replacement testnet?  We are ready to go on Erigon and have WIP on Besu.

content: How many unique "delpoyer" contracts are there that deploy contracts that have `SELFDESTRUCT` in them?

author: sky.cactus
content:

I'm curious of the count of contracts that did the deployment, rather than the count of deployed contracts.

author: g11tech
